title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this sweater
items.body: This sweater is super cute with the ruffled collar and sleeve ends. And, it is nicely made and comfy and warm. It really is the perfect sweater with a cute style to it , vs. the more conservative basic button down types. Love it!! Read more
items.author: Susan Johnson

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Almost too bulky
items.body: Pretty color and style but it is really big and bulky. I should have sized down. A little itchy. Read more
items.author: MaryLaura

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this sweater
items.body: I love the look and quality of this slightly oversized sweater. The gold buttons are a great detail and I love the ruffled collar and bottom of sleeve. It is warm and comfortable. The fabric is not itchy if you want to wear it alone buttoned it. I have not dry cleaned it yet but I do not anticipate any problems. It is great for work or casual - I love it Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater. Cheap buttons.
items.body: The sweater is very nice. Stylish with loose fit . I love the color . The only problem is the quality of the buttons. They look nice but feel very cheap. I had one break after wearing it only twice and it cannot be replaced . Wish there were replacement buttons with this item. Read more
items.author: Ericksonzoo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: I have this in beige and black. I love it. I changed the buttons on the black one. It is feminine and stylish. I wore the beige one out last night and got a lot of compliments. I will not wear it buttoned up because I think that makes it look old ladyish. I will mention that the lighter color wears better..I feel like the black looks like a black sweater looks after you wear it for a year… a little like it needs someone to use a sweater shaver Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Many compliments
items.body: I have received many compliments while wearing this clothing accessory, it does run large, I usually wear medium in this medium was quite large on me however, I like to wear it over sweaters or sweatshirts. It is wonderful that you can dress it up or dress it down. At first the fabric felt a little stiff, but after the initial wash, it softened up nicely. The color is nice and the quality is a little lacking however, for the price I would purchase again. Read more
items.author: rupert

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely, stylish sweater.
items.body: This is a beautiful sweater and a very different design that is quite flattering. I usually take a large but sized down to a medium and it fits perfectly. I'm 5'3 in 158 lb. Read more
items.author: Janis

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft! Love this!!
items.body: I was skeptical this would feel like a cheap acrylic fabric but it’s SO soft!! Great oversized fit - size down one size for a more tailored look. Dry cleaned this - haven’t washed it. Read more
items.author: Jana

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Blue, Olive Green, Apricot, Black, Camel, Orange, Red, Rose Red, Navy, Khaki, Pink, Beige, Royal Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
